data.name: MorphVOX Pro 5 - Special Effects Voices
data.detailed_description:
Add six unique audio effects to your voice with the Special Effects Voice Add-On.

Sound like you are giving orders over a radio, talking underwater, hiding out in a cave or just confuse your friends with some alien gibberish.

These new voices use the latest in MorphVOX filter technology to give you even more fun things to do with MorphVOX Pro.
